    • Method Detail

      • onSupply

        public void onSupply​(MkvChain chain,
                     String record,
                     int pos,
                     MkvChainAction action)
        Description copied from interface: MkvChainListener
        Function called when an update message for a subscribed chain is received.

        A chain can be modified in a number of ways: inserting or deleting a record, appending a record, changing the content completely (SET) or deleting the content completely (RESET).

        An IDLE event is generated before a chain snapshot which could involve multiple SET events.

        Specified by:
        onSupply in interface MkvChainListener
        Parameters:
        chain - the MkvChain object.
        record - the record affected by the modification, not significant for SET, RESET, and IDLE actions.
        pos - position of the record affected by the modification, not significant for SET, RESET, and IDLE actions.
        action - the operation done on the chain by the chain publisher.
        See Also:
        MkvChainAction
